title: SunBlockers (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: SunBlockers is free on the Epic Games Store! SunBlockers is an indie survival mini-adventure with cartoon zombies.
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Log in to your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library
